title: New: Cub Scout – Seconds
content:
So the opening fifteen seconds or so of this new track from London’s Cub Scout could well be taken directly from James Blake’s disappointing debut LP, but don’t let that put you off.

Seconds soon spreads it’s wings and unveils itself as a sumptuously delicate garage inspired number, twisting marvelously throughout it’s four and a half minute run time. Barely audible female vocals shimmer splendidly over a minimal, repetitive dubstep influenced beat, building up to the track really kicking in around the two minute mark. Check out Seconds below.
Seconds by CUB SCOUT
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
